Penumbral Leap.name: Penumbral Leap
Penumbral Leap.flavor: Weaving shadows, you step through them to deliver a punishing wound to your enemy.
Penumbral Leap.effect: You can use shadow step as a minor action until the end of your next turn.
Penumbral Leap.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Flickering Shadow.name: Flickering Shadow
Flickering Shadow.flavor: You become a living shadow, flickering and dancing at your enemyâ€™s periphery.
Flickering Shadow.effect: You create a zone in a close burst 5. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. Squares within the zone are lightly obscured. Whenever you hit with an assassin attack power while you are within the zone, you can teleport to any square within the zone and make a Stealth check to become hidden. While within the zone, you are insubstantial to attacks from enemies from which you are hidden.

Shadow Dance.name: Shadow Dance
Shadow Dance.flavor: You flit through shadows to stay one step ahead of your enemy.
Shadow Dance.effect: You enter the stance of the shadow dance. Until this stance ends, you can shadow step as a minor action and while you are within 2 squares of a creature.
